name: untitled AI Hat Puzzle game
description:
WASD to move

E to pick up hat or drop it

I made my first path Finder for the AI by myself (didn't use the one  built in unity also didn't know how) but its bad and took most of my time

all the robots use it but its only really showing in level 3 and that's the last level cause I run out of time so : (

windows version recommended
